content: History has enough examples of investors screwing up companies than the founders. Bringing an outsider CEO has served many companies with a bad taste. Uber would not have come anywhere close to had it been for any other non-radical CEO. Coining a new term, Bro-CEO is another way how media operates- “when shit starts happening, take it to the ceiling” Everyone out there has an opinion about how Uber should change the CEO yet very few would have any idea what comes with his job at the helm of the company that has not only redefined disruption but has been the torch bearer.
